interpretation: The "white large square" card represents a blank slate, an emptiness that is full of potential. This card suggests a time of clarity, purity, and new beginnings. You may feel like you have a fresh start or a clean slate, free from past mistakes or limitations. This card encourages you to approach your situation with an open mind and heart, free from preconceived notions or biases. It is a time to let go of the old and embrace the new. Use this time to start fresh and create something new and beautiful. This card also suggests that you may need to take a step back and reevaluate your situation. By taking a moment to reflect on where you are and where you want to go, you can gain clarity and focus on your goals. The "white large square" card reminds you that sometimes the best thing you can do is to let go and start anew.
